attributes.action: Recognise rent paid has affordability when trying to get a mortgage
attributes.background: When going for a mortgage the banks and mortgage companies don’t take rent paid in to consideration even though it’s mosts peoples biggest bill every month so would like them to be made to cause rent is more expensive than a mortgage

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions about whether to offer mortgages are a matter for individual lenders, not the Government or House of Commons.
